ShadowSiren:FireDamage.NAME: Fire
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Target loses Max HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. Deals up to #b25% more attack damage to targets with full HP. NL #yBlock: Application scales with #yVigor, consuming it.

#yBlock: Application scales with #yVigor, consuming it.

ShadowSiren:IceDamage.NAME: Ice
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Applies #yChill on hit. NL #yBlock: Attackers take damage equal to their #yChill.
#yDamage: Applies #yChill on hit.
#yBlock: Attackers take damage equal to their #yChill.

ShadowSiren:ShadowDamage.NAME: Shadow
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Ignores #yBlock and applies #yShadow #ySplit instead of dealing damage. NL #yBlock: When attacked, applies 3 #yShadow #ySplit to the attacker.

#yBlock: When attacked, applies 3 #yShadow #ySplit to the attacker.
